short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alt+click an element to delete it. You can remove pop ups, headers, or anything else on a website that you don't want to see!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My chrome extension allows you to delete any element that you don't want to see on a website using alt+click. After installing this extension, you can focus on the content of a website, instead of the navigation bars, side-bars, and unwanted images. Enjoy!
